short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension allowing you to open and save your files on Google Drive and Dropbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Text editor to open and save files on your Google Drive or Dropbox. Features syntax highlighting, line numbers, search and replace, sort, etc. I had trouble finding a text editor for chrome that was free, didn't have ads, and could open and save on Google Drive. Excellent for Chromebooks. Let me know what features you need and I will definitely consider adding the most popular requests.
